ACCARDI
v.
HARTFORD UNDERWRITERS INSURANCE COMPANY 42A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 2, 2019 Daniel K. Bryson, Attorney at Law, J. Hunter Bryson, Attorney at Law, for Accardi, Thomas. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kim E. Rinehart, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, David R. Roth, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Hartford Underwriters Insurance Company. Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for United Policyholders. Roger A. Peters, II, Attorney at Law, for American Property Casualty Insurance Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of May 2019 by American Property Casualty Insurance Association for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of May 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
